title: Corebiz | Samsung Brazil
description: I led the performance efforts for the Samsung Brazil stores, focusing on boosting web performance, delivering an exceptional user experience, and driving higher conversion rates. During my time at Samsung Brazil, I implemented key improvements that enhanced both the site's performance and its scalability.

title: Corebiz | Samsung Argentina
description: I worked for 3 months on the Samsung Argentina store, focusing on resolving a critical performance issue that required quick stabilization. During my time there, I implemented significant improvements that helped optimize and stabilize the platform.

title: Corebiz | Puppis Argentina
description: I was responsible for maintaining the Puppis store (puppis.com.ar), a leading retailer in the pet industry. I ensured the platform remained fully operational and resolved technical issues as they arose. Additionally, I worked closely with the team to optimize site performance and enhance the user experience.

title: Vnda Ecommerce
description: I developed new stores and features on the Vnda platform, and improved existing websites using advanced skills in Liquid, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I ensured that all projects met client specifications and aligned with the company's quality standards. I also collaborated with the team to troubleshoot issues and optimize website performance.

title: Nerau CX
description: I worked as a junior developer, turning Figma layouts into fully functional websites while maintaining design fidelity. I provided support for e-commerce platforms across multiple systems, fixing bugs and implementing improvements to enhance performance and user experience.
